product_info.title: ZQ511/ZQ521 MOBILE PRINTERS
product_info.tagline: Exceptional durability and reliability for the toughest environments
product_info.description: Zebra's ZQ500 Series just got tougher. The premium ZQ511 and ZQ521 printers — both available in RFID models — give you best-in-class, rugged mobile printing for applications in any industry. Experience ultimate durability. Engineered for tough, demanding indoor and outdoor conditions, these printers can withstand significant drops, tumbles, accidents and environmental extremes that are common in mobile workplaces.

printer.maximum_print_speed: Up to 5 in./127 mm per second (with Draft Mode enabled)
printer.media_sensors: Black mark and gap media sensing using fixed center position sensors (Note: RFID models do not support gap sensing)

zq511.imperial: 5.9 in. L x 4.7 in. W x 2.4 in. H
zq511.metric: 150 mm L x 120 mm W x 62 mm H

zq521.imperial: 6.2 in. L x 6.1 in. W x 2.6 in. H
zq521.metric: 158 mm L x 155 mm W x 67 mm H

minimum_maximum_width.zq511: 1.38 in./35 mm to 3.15 in./80 mm+1 mm

media.maximum_thickness: 0.0063 in./0.1600 mm for labels and 0.0055 in./0.1397 mm for tag/receipt
media.minimum_thickness: 0.0023 in./0.05842 mm for all media (ZQ511 Linerless SKU is 0.0021 in./0.05334 mm)
media_types: RFID (Note: ZQ511R/ZQ521R require black mark RFID media and do not support gap sensing)

power.standard_battery: 3250 mAh (nominal), removable, rechargeable PowerPrecision+ Li-Ion battery

standard: Android, Apple iOS, Windows™ Mobile connectivity
Bluetooth specification 4.1 EDR + LE
Fast roaming 802.11r supported
3250 mAh PowerPrecision+ Battery (retrievable, rechargeable Li-Ion)
USB On-The-Go ports (with optional strain relief)
Power Smart Print Technology — anticipates upcoming printing to optimize battery consumption and print speed
Direct thermal printing of barcodes, text and graphics
IP54 rated for protection against solid and liquid ingress
MIL-STD 810G certified for drop and shock
Tolerance of multiple drops from 6.6 ft./2 m to concrete
Tumble testing per the IEC68-2-32 spec with 1300 free falls from 3.3'/1m
Simple easy-to-read LCD with large icons for battery and wireless status
Dual-sided tear bar which allows for clean tears in either direction (not available with linerless SKUs)
Supports vertical and horizontal printing
Printer can be used in any orientation
Center loading, adjustable for variable roll widths
Clamshell design for easy media loading
Label odometer
XML support
Resident fixed and scalable fonts
Black mark and gap media sensing using fixed center position sensors
Cold Temperature Compensation mode
PPME, Mirror, SNMP, WebServer, AirWatch® and Soti Connect and Wavelink Avalanche®
NTP (Network Time Protocol) support via WiFi
Sleep mode supported. Wake on Bluetooth, WiFi and Touch
Real time clock (RTC) supported for time stamp certificates in WLAN SKU's only
QR code links to web-based help pages
Zebra Print Touch simplifies Bluetooth pairing and launches web-based pages with NFC
RFID is available on both the ZQ511 and ZQ521 as separate products
optional: 6500 mAh PowerPrecision+ Extended Battery (retrievable, rechargeable Li-Ion)
Linerless printing (with silicone platen roller only)

fonts_and_barcodes.standard_fonts: 25 bitmapped, 1 smooth, scalable (CG Triumvirate Bold Condensed, contains UFST™ from Agfa Monotype Corporation)
fonts_and_barcodes.scalable_fonts: Swiss721 (supporting Latin, Cyrillic, Hebrew and Arabic characters)

features: Fast roaming using PMK caching, OKC, EAP Fast Session resumption or 802.11r

connectivity.connector: Micro-AB Connector with optional strain relief

compliance.security: FIPS support available at no cost as printer OS download

warranty.coverage: Warranted against defects in workmanship and materials for 2 years from date of shipment. Batteries warranted for 1 year, printheads for 6 months.

additional_information.zebra_dna: Suite of software tools including remote management, security features, and optimization capabilities
additional_information.zebraonecare: Maintenance plans offering certified repairs and timely support
additional_information.linerless_solution: ZeroLiner Linerless Labeling Solution available for enhanced productivity and sustainability
additional_information.printer_profile_manager: Full featured remote printer management solution with real-time visibility

retail_hospitality: Click and collect receipt and label printing
